verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be unto you the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of <S%H2320>months:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall be the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> to you.

Speak <S%H1696><s%> ye <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> to them every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for a house: <S%H1004><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1004>household<s%> be too <S%H4591>little<s%> for the <S%H4480>lamb,<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7716><s%> let <S%H1931>him<s%> and his <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> <S%H7138>next<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> it according to the <S%H4373>number<s%> of the <S%H5315>souls;<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> according <S%H6310>to<s%> his <S%H400>eating<s%> shall make your <S%H3699>count<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7716>lamb.<s%>

Your <S%H7716>lamb<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year:<s%> ye shall take it <S%H3947>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3532>sheep,<s%> or <S%H4480>from<s%> the goats: <S%H5795><s%>

And ye shall <S%H1961>keep<s%> <S%H4931><s%> it up <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H2320>month:<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H996>in<s%> the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>strike<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the upper door <S%H4947>post<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

And they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H6748>roast<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and unleavened <S%H4682>bread;<s%> and <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H4844>bitter<s%> herbs they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

Eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it <S%H4995>raw,<s%> nor sodden at <S%H1311>all<s%> <S%H1310><s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H6748>roast<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> his <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H7130>purtenance<s%> thereof.

And ye shall let <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it <S%H3498>remain<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and that which <S%H3498>remaineth<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> ye shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H3602>thus<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> it; with your <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H2296>girded,<s%> your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and your <S%H4731>staff<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in <S%H2649>haste:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6453>passover.<s%>

For I will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and will <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> and against <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgment:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> to you for a <S%H226>token<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> are: and when I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I will <S%H6452>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, and the <S%H5063>plague<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> upon you to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> you, when I <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto you for a <S%H2146>memorial;<s%> and ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations;<s%> ye shall keep it a <S%H2287>feast<s%> by an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread;<s%> <S%H389>even<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall put <S%H7673>away<s%> <S%H7603>leaven<s%> out of your <S%H4480>houses:<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> from the first <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H7223><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H4480>Israel.<s%> <S%H3478><s%>

And in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation,<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to you; <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H4399>work<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> in them, <S%H389>save<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> must <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> may be <S%H6213>done<s%> of you.

And ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H853><s%> the feast of unleavened <S%H4682>bread;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> have I brought your armies <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6635><s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> therefore shall ye <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%> by an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> month, on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even.<s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall there be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7603>leaven<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H1004>houses:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> that which is <S%H2557>leavened,<s%> even <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>congregation<s%> <S%H5712><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whether he be a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> or <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>nothing<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2557>leavened;<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Draw <S%H4900>out<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> you a <S%H6629>lamb<s%> according to your <S%H4940>families,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6453>passover.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H92>bunch<s%> of <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and <S%H2881>dip<s%> it in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H5592>basin,<s%> and <S%H5060>strike<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H4947>lintel<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts<s%> <S%H4480>with<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H5592>basin;<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> of <S%H859>you<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H4480>door<s%> <S%H6607><s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> to <S%H5062>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4947>lintel,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6452>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6607>door,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>suffer<s%> the <S%H7843>destroyer<s%> to come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> your <S%H1004>houses<s%> to <S%H5062>smite<s%> you.
And ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> for an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> to thee and to thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> ye be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you, according <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>promised,<s%> that ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5656>service.<s%>
And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, <S%H4100>What<s%> mean ye by <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5656>service?<s%>

That ye shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1931>It<s%> is the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6453>passover,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6452>passed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when he <S%H5062>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> our <S%H1004>houses.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> bowed the <S%H6915>head<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H1980>away,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that at <S%H2677>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4480>firstborn<s%> <S%H1060><s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H1004>dungeon;<s%> <S%H953><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>cattle.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there was <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> there was <S%H369>not<s%> one <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> and get you <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as ye have <S%H1696>said.<s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> your <S%H1241>herds,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> ye have <S%H1696>said,<s%> and be <S%H1980>gone;<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> me <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> were <S%H2388>urgent<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they might send them <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H4116>haste;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> We be <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> men.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1217>dough<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> it was <S%H2556>leavened,<s%> their kneading <S%H4863>troughs<s%> being bound <S%H6887>up<s%> in their <S%H8071>clothes<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and they <S%H7592>borrowed<s%> of the <S%H4480>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4714><s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and raiment: <S%H8071><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> so that they <S%H7592>lent<s%> unto them such things as they required. And they <S%H5337>spoiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H4480>Rameses<s%> <S%H7486><s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> on <S%H7273>foot<s%> that were <S%H1397>men,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H4480>children.<s%> <S%H2945><s%>

And a <S%H6154>mixed<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them; and <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H1241>herds,<s%> even <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle.<s%>

And they <S%H644>baked<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H1217>dough<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it was not <S%H3808>leavened;<s%> <S%H2556><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were thrust <S%H1644>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4102>tarry,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> had they <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for themselves any <S%H6720>victual.<s%>

Now the <S%H4186>sojourning<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> was <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
